TopicTitle: Satellites loose SAS every time i reload the game.

Articles.Content:
Every time i load my game, the satellites i have in Kerbin orbit loose SAS. They have antennae fitted. They have solar pannels, which supply enough power to the battery and the other systems. I have to jump in to the tracking centre to turn it back on and turn on the orientation so they face antenna to the surface of the planet. Is this a known issue? I can do a recording of this if required. I am including the link to a screenshot of the sat as could not ad through the insert function. It is a test comm sat. I have several in orbit at different trajectories.

imgur.com/a/zhF92Mz

Yup same thing.  Very annoying, because I launched a probe to go to Duna, went into orbit kerbin and my timer warp is locked only half way.  So really don't have fast time warp.  So I got annoyed and shut off game.

Just started up and now I still have time warp issue + my SAS is dead.

I'm going to take a guess and say that the save file for the Remote Part is not saving the Module information correctly for them in the save file.  Most likely missing the SAS Module information.  So when you load the game save your part is not loading the SAS data it needs.
